textBeforeTable: Additional Details: (Passes to the Aspen Club & Spa can be obtained from any Frias Properties front desk during regular business hours.) All Frias Properties of Aspen guests receive complimentary passes to the Aspen Club & Spa, the valley's premier full-service spa and workout facility. Complex amenities include free on-site parking, free Aspen airport transfers and an on-site hot tub. Unit amenities include recent upgrades, gas fireplaces, flatscreen TVs, decks with views of downtown and free wireless internet. Bedding is king (master), king (1st guest), double (2nd guest), two twins (3rd guest) and a full-size sofa pullout in the master suite office. The top-floor master bedroom has an en suite office with a gas fireplace that can be converted into a 5th bedroom. This three-level 4-bedroom, 3-bath deluxe townhome is only one block from historic Lift 1A and walking distance to downtown Aspen. Dolomite Villas Condo Complex: Contact Us
